alert.note: Alert for Natchitoches (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 30 at 12:54PM CDT until March 30 at 1:15PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL GRANT...SOUTHEASTERN NATCHITOCHES AND SOUTH CENTRAL WINN PARISHES... At 1254 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles southwest of Winnfield to near Montgomery to near Flatwoods, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Colfax, Chopin, Aloha, Lake Iatt and Williana. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 PM CDT for northwestern Louisiana. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for north central Louisiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
